entry.def: A seer is a person who tells people what will happen in the future.

example.ex: ...the writings of the 16th century French seer, Nostradamus.
example.tran: 16世纪法国预言家诺斯特拉达穆斯的作品

example.ex: ...the economic seers who regularly provide The Economist with forecasts.
example.tran: 定期为《经济学家》杂志提供前瞻性预测的经济预言家

means.word_mean: 1. a person with unusual powers of foresight
3. an authoritative person who divines the future
